players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together as a team to find out who among us could have done this."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. We need to remain calm and focused in order to identify the culprit behind Alice's death. Let us discuss any suspicious behavior or patterns we have observed."
You: "I'd like to remind everyone that we are all in this together as a team. Let us keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before jumping to conclusions."

Diana: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems important to consider the possibility that one of us may be a mafia member. Let's pay close attention to any inconsistencies or unusual behavior from Charlie and Bob during the night actions."

Charlie: "I want to assure everyone that I am committed to finding the truth and bringing justice for Alice. I have full confidence in our ability to work together as a team and uncover any hidden information."
